short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute offensive language in Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mute profanity on Youtube, Netflix, and Amazon Prime. Just turn on subtitles - Swearerer will hide them, but uses them to check for and mute offensive language. Note on Youtube: subtitles are often auto-generated or provided by the user. These can occasionally fail to capture the offensive language, in which case some of the language may "leak through".
